Trade/Device Name(s): Puritan Liquid Amies Swab Collection and Transport System
Puritan® Liquid Amies Collection and Transport System
Regulation Name(s): Microbiological specimen collection and transport device
Specimen Type(s): Clinical specimens containing aerobic, anaerobic, and fastidious bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Puritan Liquid Amies Collection and Transport System for clinical specimen collection and transport to laboratory for microbiological examination
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for collection and transport of clinical specimens containing aerobic, anaerobic and fastidious bacteria from patient to laboratory for bacteriological examination and culture
